1.0.name: wordpress/custom-newsletter-template
1.0.description:
If you need paid support to get this plugins installed or to have a customized version of the plugins please send us an email to this address contact@cybernetikz.com.

You can create your own custom template for newsletter using this plugins. It is so easy and simple for any user to manage. By using this you can customize each and every content of the newsletter template from Wordpress admin panel.

Key Feature

  • Create your own newsletter template for your domain.
  • HTML is based on table tag so it will generate same output for all mail service available like, yahoo, gmail, aol, msn, microsoft outlook etc.
  • Ability to control / customize each and every content of newsletter template like, background color, background image, font color, selective text, favicon, page title, header image, footer content, ads image/link, social image/link, post count etc.
  • F
